summary: This bill, the Freight Rail Assets Investment to Launch Commercial Activity Revitalization Act of 2025 (Freight RAILCAR Act of 2025), proposes a tax credit for modernizing or replacing freight railcars. The credit is equal to 10% of freight railcar fleet modernization expenses, up to a limit of 1,000 qualified railcars per taxpayer.  It defines qualified railcars and modernization expenses, sets criteria for eligibility, and includes special rules concerning double benefits, basis adjustments, and sale-leaseback transactions. The Treasury Department is directed to submit a report on the credit's impact within three years. The tax credit would be effective for property placed in service and amounts incurred after December 31, 2024.
